And there's also Nexus and Mebius.

The original GARO is the only one I know about.

And Metalder is the only Metal hero entry you can really watch. (Aside from those recent space sheriff movies, Which I've heard aren't that great.)

Metalder has some amazing villains, But the hero isn't that memorable.
